thoughts.text: I want to learn more about the potential risks of consuming seafood caught in the Pacific Ocean after the release of treated nuclear wastewater from the Fukushima Dai'ichi nuclear power plant. The 'browse_website' command returned information from the FDA about the risks of consuming radioactive contaminated foods imported from Japan, but I want to learn more about the potential risks of consuming seafood caught in the Pacific Ocean. I will use the 'google' command to search for more information on this topic.
